overview: "BLACK DELIVER" is a brand new all black, all gay blockbuster, produced by Satellite Video and directed by the incomparabale Frank Ross. It was shot directly on video tape, which makes it's sound and picture quality the very finest available in the industry today. The plot revoves around a take-out delivery boy and everything that happens when he delivers the food. And talk about action ..... the sucking, cumshots, and ass fucking are non-stop! And that's only one of the rason the BLACK DELIVERY was warded four stars.
title: Black Delivery
